title: Beyond WebAssembly: Ben Titzer's New Programming Language, Virgil
author: David Cassel
description: During a recent visit to Microarch, Ben Titzer described Virgil as a language designed for building lightweight high-performance systems.
cntitle: 超越 WebAssembly：Ben Titzer 的新编程语言 Virgil
cndescription: 在最近一次对 Microarch 的访问中，Ben Titzer 将 Virgil 描述为一种为构建轻量级高性能系统而设计的语言。
